Reviews.Title: “Customer Service Horrible”
Reviews.Author: woofer824
Reviews.Content: planning getting surgery indy door called booked reservation 3 weeks advance day surgery told overbooked set sister min hotel 500 feet surgery instead drive 20 min unhappy lack communication

Reviews.Title: “Good experience”
Reviews.Author: RetiredTravelerOhio
Reviews.Content: impromptu reunion looked close stay stayed various locations indianapolis location closes house hotel looked maintained staff friendly clean breakfast little usual fairfield inn ncaa swim meet weekend teams staying staff miss beat keeping breakfast stocked overall stay excellent

Reviews.Title: “Great Fairfield Inn”
Reviews.Author: NoelD37
Reviews.Content: stay short notice travelling encountered major storm marriot central reservations recommended fairfield inn closest location available pleasently surprised stayed fairfield inns outstanding excellent staff helpful comfortable quiet convenient rate highly recommend youre definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Typical Fairfield Inn. Front desk not as friendly as others”
Reviews.Author: WorldTraverler73
Reviews.Content: im currently week business location outside city ton close eat shop entertain beds comfortable clean stayed entire stay breakfast tons compared stayed nice bring breakfast 10 tables front desk maybe spoiled recent stays fairfield inns exceptional front desk people greeting werent guest wishing night day left sitting corner didnt acknowledge issue didnt affect stay stick 4 star rating
